Interface PropertyChangeListener

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
BeanContextSupport, JList.AccessibleJList, JTable.AccessibleJTable, DefaultTableColumnModel, BasicComboPopup.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicTabbedPaneUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicOptionPaneUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicInternalFrameTitlePane.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicScrollBarUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicToolBarUI.PropertyListener, BasicButtonListener, BasicInternalFrameUI.InternalFramePropertyChangeListener, BasicListUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicLabelUI, BasicComboBoxUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicDirectoryModel, BasicColorChooserUI.PropertyHandler, BasicTreeUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicTreeUI.SelectionModelPropertyChangeHandler, BasicSplitPaneUI.PropertyHandler, BasicSplitPaneDivider, BasicScrollPaneUI.PropertyChangeHandler, BasicRootPaneUI, BasicSliderUI.PropertyChangeHandler, MetalFileChooserUI.FilterComboBoxModel, MetalToolBarUI.MetalRolloverListener
public interface PropertyChangeListener
extends EventListener

A "PropertyChange" event gets fired whenever a bean changes a "bound" property. You can register a PropertyChangeListener with a source bean so as to be notified of any bound property updates.

Method Summary
 void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
          This method gets called when a bound property is changed.
 

Method Detail

propertyChange

public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
This method gets called when a bound property is changed.
Parameters:
evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
